## About
Designing, developing, and optimizing complex applications and scalable systems. Experienced in research methodologies and analytics, applying data-driven insights. Driven by curiosity and a passion for impactful technology have led to proficiency across a wide tech stack:

## Chains
### Contracts
- [contract-template](https://github.com/andreas-timm/contract-template) ‚Äî Contract (EVM) development and maintain system template.
- [solidity-preprocessor](https://github.com/andreas-timm/solidity-preprocessor) ‚Äî Solidity preprocessor

### Tool chains
- [code-signature-ts](https://github.com/andreas-timm/code-signature-ts) ‚Äî Tool to sign text files, such as source code, with an EVM account using EIP-191 signatures.
- BTC ‚Äî A collection of tools for Bitcoin address generation, information retrieval, and various utilities.
  - [btc-address](https://github.com/andreas-timm/btc-address) ‚Äî Bitcoin address generator in the shell.

## Utils ‚Ä£ Notification
- [tm](https://github.com/andreas-timm/tm) ‚Äî Simple readable utility on bash that sends messages like a bot in telegram.
